name: Panda Bilingual Daycare
address: 30 Cambridgepark Drive, Cambridge, MA, 02140 (Note: This is in Massachusetts, not Kansas, but is a bilingual Mandarin-English center.)
description: A bilingual Mandarin-English early learning center combining Montessori philosophy with Chinese and American language and culture

name: WonderWhiz Academy
description: Offers Chinese-English daycare with daily bilingual story time, music, and arts and crafts

name: Blooming Stars Education Center
description: An English and Mandarin Chinese bilingual early education center using the Montessori philosophy

name: Sunshine Bilingual Learning & Childcare
description: Offers hands-on, bilingual childcare with a strong emphasis on safety and a nurturing environment. Many staff members are native Chinese speakers

name: Little Bee Preschool
address: Presidio and Lombard locations (Note: These are in California, not Kansas, but offer Mandarin immersion.)
description: Offers a bilingual English-Mandarin Immersion Preschool with Chinese and English classrooms

name: Little Wagon Early Education Center
address: Belmont, MA (Note: This is in Massachusetts, not Kansas.)
description: A Chinese-English bilingual multicultural preschool that aims to integrate Western and Chinese early childhood practices

name: Emmanuel Chinese School of Kansas City
description: Offers Mandarin classes for children, with fall semester classes starting August 16, 2025. This is a language school, not a daycare

name: Kansas City Institute of Chinese Language and Culture (kcschoolorg)
address: Smith Building at MNU, 14040 S Murlen Rd, Olathe, KS 66062
description: Offers Mandarin classes and cultural activities. This is a language school, not a daycare

name: Premier Learning
address: 72nd/Metcalf in Overland Park, KS and 95th St in Overland Park, KS (also a location in Prairie Village, KS)
description: Offers an educational and nurturing learning environment with experienced teachers. While not explicitly Chinese-speaking, it's a general daycare option

name: New Horizon Academy
address: Corner of 119th Street and Quivira Road, Overland Park, KS
description: Provides high-quality daycare and preschool programs for children ages 6 weeks to 5 years, with a comprehensive curriculum. While not explicitly Chinese-speaking, it's a general daycare option
